Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Text: Then, cream together in the large mixing bowl the softened butter, the sugar, the brown sugar and the vanilla extract with the whisk.
After that, beat the eggs lightly with a fork and add them to the mixture, blending until it is all smooth.
Next, add the flour, salt, baking powder and baking soda into the moist mixture.
Once all the ingredients have been blended all together into a soft dough, gently fold in the chocolate chips using the spoon.
After that, roll the dough out into a 4 cm diameter, 25 cm long cylinder.
Then, cut the dough tube with a knife into roughly 1 cm thick slices.
Place the cookies on the non-stick baking tray, making sure to keep them apart.
After that, bake the cookies in the hot oven for about 12-15 minutes or until they are slightly golden brown.
Lastly, remove the cookies from the oven and allow them to cool.
